00043    * Read the probability from file.
00044    */
00045    void McMove::readProbability(std::istream &in)
00046    {  read<double>(in, "probability", probability_); }
00047    
00048    /*
00049    * Trivial implementation - initializes counters.
00050    */
00051    void McMove::setup()
00052    { 
00053       nAttempt_ = 0;
00054       nAccept_  = 0;
00055    }
00056 
00057    /*
00058    * Trivial default implementation - always returns false.
00059    */
00060    bool McMove::move()
00061    { 
00062       ++nAttempt_;
00063       return false; 
00064    }
00065 
00066    /*
00067    * Trivial default implementation - do nothing
00068    */

00070    {
00071    }

00073    /*
00074    * Save the internal state to an archive.
00075    */
00076    void McMove::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00077    {  
00078       ar & nAttempt_;
00079       ar & nAccept_;
00080    }
00081 
00085    void McMove::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)

00087       ar & nAttempt_;
